[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Medical grade recorders from Medicapture and Ikegami capture videos in up to 4k resolution for education and patient documentation. Compatible with all of the cameras we distribute.

Features and specifications depend recorder model.

  • Record to internal hard drive or USB drive
  • HDMI, DVI, or HD-SDI inputs
  • Built-in screen or touchscreen
  • Start/stop recording using footswitch or remote
  • Record photos and videos up to 4k resolution

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”72974,72971,72972,72973″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1574894060455{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Medical Recorders

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Medical Recorders take the video signal from your camera and save it to a built-in hard drive or external media such as a flash drive. They then pass the video through to your monitor, and in some cases display the video on a built-in screen. Most medical video cameras do not have a built-in recording function, and separate recorders are able to capture video in higher quality.

Sample videos can be found on our YouTube page.

Medicapture MVR-Lite – Specifications here

  • Captures up to FHD (1080p) resolution
  • Records to USB media
  • HDMI or DVI input

Medicapture MVR-Lite 4K – Specifications here

  • Captures up to 4k (2160p) resolution
  • Records to USB media
  • HDMI, DVI, or 4x SDI (using converter) input

Ikegami MDR-600HD – Specifications here

  • Captures up to FHD (1080p) resolution
  • Records to internal hard drive or USB media
  • DVI, HD-SDI, and HDMI (using DVI-HDMI cable) input
  • Built-in screen

Medicapture MVR-Pro – Specifications here

  • Captures up to FHD (1080p) resolution
  • Records to USB media
  • HDMI or DVI input
  • Built-in touchscreen

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d54feb9-612d”][vc_column_text]

The medical grade recorders we distribute are compatible with all of the C-mount video cameras we distribute.

1080p recorders are compatible with 4k cameras, but will not capture the full resolution.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3dfeb9-612d”][vc_column_text]

Medical grade video recorders are class 1 devices, and are approved to bear the CE mark.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014afeb9-612d”][vc_column_text]

All of the recorders we carry include a 1 year or longer manufacturer’s warranty depending on the brand.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
